sentence.Network_en: His mother's voice was one he knew; ice cold and deadly.
sentence.Network_cn: 母亲的声音是他很熟悉的：冰冷、无情。

sentence.Network_en: The deal was put on ice for three months.
The only sound was the crackle of breaking ice.
sentence.Network_cn: 唯一的声响是冰层噼噼啪啪碎裂的声音。

list.abs: The wings of birds were clogged with ice and snow - Dryden ., 鸟的翅膀为冰雪所束缚 -- 戴顿.
The wings of birds were clogged with ice and snow ., 鸟儿的翅膀被冰雪束缚着.
The streams are clogged up with ice ., 这些河流被冰阻塞.
沪江词库精选clogging是什么意思、英语单词推荐、用法及解释、中英文句子翻译、英语... ice clogging 冰塞  non-clogging impeller 不阻塞的叶轮  oil-screen.
